definition: to offer tribute/to pay tribute that a vassal owes to his suzerain
to be bestowed, conferred, or granted by the emperor
Gong Cha, international franchise selling Taiwan-style milk tea and smoothies etc, established in Kaohsiung in 2006
to bestow/to confer (a reward for service)/a reward
to consecrate/to enshrine and worship/an offering (to one's ancestors)/a sacrifice (to a God)
to make offerings (to gods or ancestors)/to offer gifts to superiors in order to win their favor
the three sacrificial animals (originally cow, sheep and pig; later pig, chicken and fish)
